enable: ip nat inside source <ACL No.> <pool | static IP> <overload>
Enter privileged EXEC mode: Configure dynamic NAT. It instructs the router to translate all addresses identified by the ACL on the pool. To configure Port Address Translation (PAT) use the “overload” at the end.

enable: ip nat inside source static <local IP> <global IP>
Enter privileged EXEC mode: Create a static NAT from inside (local IP) to outside (global IP)

enable: ip nat outside source static <ACL No.> <pool | static IP>
Enter privileged EXEC mode: Create a static NAT from outside (ACL) to inside (IP pool)
